metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24599 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.Description: In autofile Audio File Library 0.3.6, there exists one memory leakvulnerability in printfileinfo, in printinfo.c, which allows an attacker toleak sensitive information via a crafted file. The printfileinfo functioncalls the copyrightstring function to get data, however, it dosn't use zerobytes to truncate the data.

criterions.comment: audiofile package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
